timeline.message: gh-2223 Admin Override for RemoveGraph and GetAllGraphIds
gh-2223 Admin override for RemoveGraph uses predicate
gh-2223 FederatedAdminIT tests for a NonAdmin user requesting admin override.
gh-2223 change to gaffer.store.admin.auth and renaming
gh-2223 remove graph admin param added.
gh-2223 refinements and package protected methods in FederatedGraphStorage

timeline.bodyText: package protected because FederatedStore is the only class that uses FederatedGraphStorage, it should not exist anywhere else or be accessed else where.
timeline.author: GCHQDev404

replies.bodyText: Unless someone has extended the federated store cache and used the methods, in which case this could break that functionality. In the interests of limiting breaking changes, might it be better to leave this as-is?
replies.author: d47853

timeline.bodyText: Now returns the success of removing graph.
